meta.name: Web3 Metaverse
meta.description: 元宇宙风格，霓虹紫蓝，适合VR/AR、虚拟世界

base.container: background-color: #0f0c29; color: #e0e6ed; font-family: 'Orbitron', 'Rajdhani', sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.75; padding: 18px;
base.link: color: #00d4ff; text-decoration: none; text-shadow: 0 0 10px #00d4ff80; border-bottom: 1px solid #00d4ff;

header_window.style: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #0f0c29, #302b63, #24243e); border: 2px solid #00d4ff; border-radius: 12px 12px 0 0; padding: 14px 24px; margin-bottom: 24px; box-shadow: 0 0 20px #00d4ff40;
header_window.title_style: color: #00d4ff; font-size: 12px; letter-spacing: 3px; text-transform: uppercase; text-shadow: 0 0 10px #00d4ff;

headings.h2: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #00d4ff, #7b2cbf); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; margin: 26px 0 16px; text-shadow: 0 0 30px #00d4ff40;
headings.h3: color: #9d4edd; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; margin: 20px 0 12px; padding-left: 14px; border-left: 4px solid #00d4ff; box-shadow: -2px 0 10px #00d4ff40;
headings.h1: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #00d4ff, #7b2cbf); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; margin: 26px 0 16px; text-shadow: 0 0 30px #00d4ff40;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #00d4ff20, #7b2cbf20); color: #00d4ff; padding: 3px 8px; border-radius: 4px; border: 1px solid #00d4ff60; font-size: 90%;

blocks.code_block: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a2e, #16213e); color: #00d4ff; padding: 16px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 18px 0; font-size: 12px; border: 1px solid #00d4ff40; box-shadow: 0 0 15px #00d4ff20, inset 0 0 15px #00d4ff10;
blocks.quote_tip: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #00d4ff15, #7b2cbf15); border: 1px solid #00d4ff; color: #00d4ff; padding: 14px 18px; margin: 18px 0; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 0 15px #00d4ff20;
blocks.quote_warning: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #7b2cbf15, #e040fb15); border: 1px solid #e040fb; color: #e040fb; padding: 14px 18px; margin: 18px 0; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 0 15px #e040fb20;
blocks.hr: border: 0; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #00d4ff, #7b2cbf, transparent); margin: 32px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a2e50, #16213e50); border: 2px dashed #00d4ff60; color: #00d4ff; padding: 24px; text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 12px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 40px; padding: 20px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #00d4ff10, #7b2cbf10); border-radius: 12px; text-align: center; border: 1px solid #00d4ff30;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
